478.description: Our legal authority for this collection is the Liquor Act, R.S.Y. 2002, c.140 and the Liquor Regulations, OIC 1977/37. If you have any questions about why we need this information

479.description: please contact Licensing & Inspections branch at (867) 667-5245 or Toll Free within Yukon 1-800-661-0408 ext 5245 or at 9031 Quartz Road, Whitehorse, Yukon Y1A 4P9.
